term.title: normal

item.text: The term 'normal' in e.g. 'normal boiling temperature' means the value at a pressure of 101325 Pa.

sources.item: PAC, 1994, 66, 533. 'Standard quantities in chemical thermodynamics. Fugacities, activities and equilibrium constants for pure and mixed phases (IUPAC Recommendations 1994)' on page 537 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199466030533)

item.title: Wikipedia - Condiciones normales de presión y temperatura (ast)
Wikipedia - Discusión:Condiciones normalizadas de presión y temperatura (es)

Users of these terms are encouraged to include the version of a term with its use and to check regularly for updates to term definitions that you are using.
